content:
> info
> Need help with Dispatch? Talk to us in the Discord Developers Server!
This page outlines some of the common errors codes that may be encountered when using Dispatch.
Choose a new location, or change write permissions on desired location
Attempt to manually remove game files from disk
Restart Discord, attempt to uninstall/reinstall the game, ensure script is correct
Escalate in the #dispatch channel of the Discord Developers Server
Escalate in the #dispatch channel of the Discord Developers Server
User most likely denied Windows administrator permissions prompt. Try again, and accept the prompt
Attempted to patch the game while running: ensure the game process is entirely ended, try restarting Discord, try disabling antivirus
Ensure that your manifests are properly selected in the Developer Portal for your SKU
Intermittent API issues. Wait, escalate in the #dispatch channel of the Discord Developers Server
Intermittent API issues. Wait, escalate in the #dispatch channel of the Discord Developers Server
Check that your manifests are properly configured in the Developer Portal. Have the user install the game from the Library, not the store page
User has multiple Discords open trying to patch the same game; only use one
Catch-all error code. Escalate in the #dispatch channel of the Discord Developers Server with repro steps/as much info as possible
